plugins.name: brand-voice
plugins.description: Write in the Manzanita Research voice — warm, grounded, direct, never corporate. Use for any prose output: READMEs, marketing pages, social posts, changelogs, error messages, UI copy, blog posts, or any text that carries the brand.

plugins.name: frontend-design
plugins.description: Build frontend interfaces for Manzanita Research — warm, editorial, California-rooted design for music tools and brand pages. React + Tailwind. Use when building web components, pages, landing pages, dashboards, plugin UIs, or any web interface for Manzanita projects.

plugins.name: generate-hero-prompt
plugins.description: Generate image prompts for Manzanita Research hero images. Reads the current repo to infer what the project is, then writes prompts you can paste into Flora or any text-to-image tool. Eco-futurist, feminine, 1980s-meets-2180s California.

plugins.name: pitch-md
plugins.description: Create or update a PITCH.md — a plain-text pitch for your project that tells the story, communicates the vision, and makes the case. Not a README (that's for users). Not a pitch deck (that's theater). This is the argument for why this thing should exist, written clearly enough that it speaks for itself.

plugins.name: tui-design
plugins.description: Build terminal user interfaces for Manzanita Research — warm, textured, California-rooted TUI design for CLI tools and interactive terminals. Go + Bubble Tea + Lip Gloss. Use when building TUI dashboards, interactive CLIs, terminal menus, status displays, or any terminal interface for Manzanita projects.
